ApplicationFormTerm.name: ApplicationFormTerm
ApplicationFormTerm.description: Represents the terms associated with an application form for a loan or a lease.

ApplicationFormId.description: A form that captures the applicant requirements for a financial product application.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date till which a term is related to an application form.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from which a term is related to an application form.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the application form term is active (true), or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the application form term.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The product or proposal related to an application form term.

TermDetail.description: A detailed description about the term related to an application form that's referenced during the decisioning process.

TermId.description: A term related to an application form that represents conditions offered to the customer.
